title: Crystal Introduction and Meditation | L'Auberge de Sedona
description: Crystal Introduction and Meditation An introduction to crystals and stones explaining the meaning of the types, colors and shapes. We will identify specific stones for healing, protection, clarity and grounding, which can be supportive and are easy to find. Everyone will receive one crystal of their choice, which they can charge on the vortex. There
